meta.title: Joshua Unrau - Personal Portfolio
meta.description: Joshua Unrau is a software developer based in Montreal. He is passionate about implementing innovative, open-source solutions.
hero.title: Hi, I'm Josh
hero.subtitle: I am a full-stack software developer at the Douglas Research Centre, where I lead the development of OpenDataCapture, an open-source, web-based platform for clinical research data collection.
